column1: Montepuez is the second largest city in the province of Cabo Delgado in Mozambique
column2: after the provincial capital of Pemba.

column1: It is the seat of Montepuez District.

column2: Montepuez has been one of the world's largest producers of rubies. Discovered in 2009
column3: the ruby deposits here are thought to potentially comprise 40% of the world's ruby supply.
